title: Unpopular argument: State of midlane
body:
Let’s be honest here when assasins are dominant more then half the map is in danger.. b/c at some point in the game the assasins will kill you being so fed.. As opposed to mages being powerful like Azir / Orriana. When control mages are viable (as it is now they really aren’t that good unless played at a great level) they aren’t that oppressive..

Now when you look at itemization assasins have ap shields like null orb and hex drinker while opposed to having mages only have one armor item, {{item:3157}}  and no I I’ll not count seekers arm guards as good since that flat armor isn’t so use full when’s it comes to SURVIVING.  It’s fair to say itemization plays a great role in damage and survival. As now assasin burst is instant why can’t mages have an ad shield or rune for such. Why can’t it be. 

Also. Another item mages lack is a qss, or ap champion in general lack this item while it makes no sense why.

IMO it’s not right that ap itemization in terms of deffence lacks greatly as well as in survivability... please compensate some items to survive burst for ap champions.

replies.body: Another "unpopular" opinion post where it's basically just repeated the bad points of multiple Mage main circlejerk post. We need to be better than this if we want riot to come back.

Yeah I've seen like 10 threads of this arguement but riot isn't going to implement it, Pros are already struggling to keep up with the meta changing so fast this would just change it even faster, I'd like to this "update" come out but at a viable time, like preseason or mid season.

I've been saying for awhile that we need another Armor AP item(Pref a reverse Maw) and a AP QSS.

The other day vs a all AD team I bought both Zhonyas and GA just so Kayn, Talon, Renek, Pyke, and Yas couldn't just murder me.
League needs more items for Mages in general, because it feels like all mages have the same damn itemization.
you know what's stupid? Dark harvest. Even though it's a rune that's not run very much, just the idea of it. Infinite scaling on an assassin? Really Riot?
